notify.found-nothing: You didn't find anything of interest here
notify.max-plants: You cannot plant anymore plants right now
notify.no-vehicle: Am I high? Where in this car would I plant this..?
notify.no-bud: You do not have enough bud to do this
notify.no-pot: You are missing a pot to plant this in
notify.pot-broke: You broke the plant pot while harvesting
notify.no-shovel: You do not have a shovel to plant this
notify.no-water: You do not have a watering can
notify.no-fertilizer: You do not have any fertilizer
notify.no-shears: You do not have any shears to harvest this
notify.no-money: You do not have enough money
notify.no-police: There are not enough police in the city
notify.all-added: All plants have been added to the map
notify.all-removed: All plants have been removed from the map
notify.not-authorized: You are not authorized to enter

textui.placement-controls:
**Controls**  
 **W**: Move Forward  
 **S**: Move Backward  
 **A**: Move Left  
 **D**: Move Right  
 **X**: Cancel  
 **Space**: Confirm
textui.open-shop:
**Smoke on the Water**  
 E - Open Shop

plant-menu.thirst-desc: Current thirst level - %.1f%% (Click here to water)
plant-menu.hunger-desc: Current hunger level - %.1f%% (Click here to feed)
plant-menu.harvest-desc-not-ready: Harvesting is only available at 100% growth
plant-menu.harvest-desc-ready: You can now harvest this plant

admin-menu.by-id-desc: View details of each plant by its ID
admin-menu.by-owner-desc: View all plants grouped by their owners
admin-menu.add-blips-desc: Display all plants as blips on the map
admin-menu.remove-blips-desc: Remove all plant blips from the map
admin-menu.plant-details-gps-desc: Create a waypoint to the plant
admin-menu.plant-details-add-blip-desc: Create a blip for this plant
admin-menu.plant-details-remove-blip-desc: Remove the blip for this plant
admin-menu.plant-details-copy-coords: Click to copy coordinates to clipboard
admin-menu.plant-details-copy-identifier: Click to copy identifier to clipboard

destroy-alert.content: You are about to irreversibly destroy this plant and receive nothing in return, *are you sure you want to continue?*

rolling-input.title: Rolling Table
rolling-input.label: Quantity
rolling-input.desc: How many %s's do you want to roll?

bagging-input.title: Bagging Table
bagging-input.label: Quantity
bagging-input.desc: How many %s's do you want to bag?

shop-input.label: Quantity
shop-input.desc: How many do you want to purchase?

logs.plant-harvested-message: %s (identifier: %s) has harvested a plant and received x%d %s and x%d %s
